attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement to say on products if it's tested on animals
attributes.additional_details: There's a number of laws about animal testing, but nothing on informing the public if their product has been tested on animals or their ingredients. Household product testing is where there needs to be a total drive as there has been no ban or movement in this sector, and this is where the most cruelty seems to happen, animals are Injected with chemicals into their skin, tablets of chemicals shoved down their throat to check for side effects such as vomiting, organ failure and even paralysis.
attributes.background: Animals have feelings too and nowadays too many companies are testing on animals. Imagine our pet was one of them? How would you feel? I know this will never stop in our lifetime, however we can take a small step by making it a legal requirement to say on products if it's tested on animals.
